article_node.title: Trump says Putin wants a deal as Kremlin says Ukraine war aims remain ‘unchanged’
article_node.summary: Ahead of a high-stakes summit in Alaska, Russian President Vladimir Putin praised President Trump's efforts to negotiate peace in Ukraine, despite ongoing Russian military advances. Concerns are mounting in Europe and Ukraine that the talks may lead to a deal favoring Moscow, potentially sidelining Kyiv's interests. British Prime Minister Keir Starmer met with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky, emphasizing the need for Putin to demonstrate a genuine commitment to peace, while Trump hinted at possible territorial concessions during the negotiations.
